name: Fix for selenium 3.7.1
body: BREAKING CHANGE !!! This release is NOT compatible with selenium 3.7.0 or older. Do not get version 2.x of Selenium-Grid-Extras, if you are not on selenium 3.7.1 or newer.

name: Prevent selenium 3.7.1 with selenium-grid-extras 1.x
body: Upgrade to Selenium-Grid-Extras 2.x if you would like to use Selenium 3.7.1. Selenium-Grid-Extras 2.x will NOT be compatible with selenium 3.7.0 or older.

name: Fix for selenium 3.7.1
body: BREAKING CHANGE !!! This release is NOT compatible with selenium 3.7.0 or older. Do not get version 2.0.0 of Selenium-Grid-Extras, if you are not on 3.7.1 or newer.

name: Add servlets to node config
body: Add servlets list to node confog

name: Fix issue with 1.12.13
body: Add check for null for 'custom' inside of node config.

name: Selenium Grid Extras Version 1.12.13
body: Some improvements.

name: Version 1.12.12
body: Fixes Precondition error when using Selenium 3.2.0 . Fix video recording.

name: Version 1.12.11
body:
Some bug fixes

https://github.com/groupon/Selenium-Grid-Extras/compare/v1.12.10...v1.12.11

name: Fix multiple nodes on same machine with selenium 3
Bug Fix - Geckodriver update
body: Add the version to the geckodriver executable filename. This way the update will work (it will see the file doesn't exist, so it will download it).

name: Version 1.12.5 - Minor bug fixes and enhancements
body: See changelog for details.

name: Version 1.12.4 - Selenium 3.0 beta support. Minor bug fixes
Version 1.12.3 - Marionette support. Additional Node Classpath. And More!
body: See the CHANGELOG

name: Version 1.12.2 - Minor fix with non-windows and first time config
1.11.8 - Adding ability to set automatic user logon for Windows both on and off Active Directory
body:
- Adding ability to set automatic user logon for Windows both on and off Active Directory
- Start multiple hubs on a machine (PR #177)
- Start nodes with minimized console window
- Allow turning on/off the SessionHistory feature. (PR #167)
- Delete old videos in hub before downloading a new video (PR #162)
- Fix issue #159, where you can't pass in "-Xmx" or any option not starting with -D

name: Fix GitHub rate limiting bug
body:
- [BUG] Cache responses from GitHub for 24 hours, to prevent a situation where GitHub rate limits the update checks
- Merge pull request #141 from smccarthy/fix_kill_pid
- Merge pull request #143 from smccarthy/fix_reboot

name: 1.10.0 - WebDriver temp file cleanup
body:
- WhenKilling IE, kill any crash reports that might be open
- Clean up any empty WebDriver directories in Windows Temp directory at shutdown
- Logs are now deleted based on time stamp and size
- [BUG] fix the actual deleting of old logs of certain size

name: 1.9.1 - Fix auto update start script
body:
- Fix how the start script is being written on post update
- Update README to describe self updates

name: 1.9.0 - Self update Grid Extras
body: - Add self updating feature to Selenium Grid Extras

name: 1.8.0 - Fixing IE issues and adding new node support
body:
- Improve IE post build clean up, to clear all history and cache
- Clear up logs once they reach a certain size
- issue #140: Changed the WebDriverReleaseManager urls to https
- pull #106: fixed the StopGrid command for Windows
- Adding support for Appium

name: Bug Fix - Hub cannot connect to nodes (introduced in 1.7.0)
body: - [BUG] Fixing a situation where sometimes the nodes are idle but hub cannot connect to them

name: 1.7.0 Video recording overhall (Yanked)
body:
- Hub will attempt to download the video from each node and collect them in 1 place, so user can view the test run from the http://hub:3000
- Set default videos to keep to be 30 instead of 10
- Adding ability to watch videos from home page of grid extras
- Improving Video recording functionality and adding more logs
- Adding an error message if use tries to start video recording on a headless OS
- Display grid extras version on Homepage. Pull request #62
- [BUG] Exit with better message if node config or hub config is not present. Issue #60 and #61
- [BUG] fixing the bug, where session history was never recorded.
- [BUG] More cleaner message on servlete if the screenshot cannot be taken. Issue #61

name: Fix orphaned zombie TestSlots
body: - [BUG] Significantly improved logic for restarting grid nodes, to prevent orphan session in the new session queue and chances of a bad TestSlot that cannot be cleaned up.
